summary: An American submarine traveling through dangerous territorial waters is put in even more danger when two scientists bring venomous snakes on board.
cast: Luke Perry|Krista Allen|Tom Berenger|Louis Mandylor|Anthony Tyler Quinn|John L. Curtis|Robert Catrini|David Andriole|Sam Scarber|Travis Joe Dixon|Haran Jackson|Oliver Rayon|Bill J. Stevens|Gerald Webb|T. Ryan Mooney|Sterling Hiroshi Greene|Kimo Keoke|Ted Monte|Jeffrey Christopher Todd|McKay Stewart|Michael Galvez|Austin Honaker
title: Silent Venom
